sentences.en: Cairo has only thirteen square centimetres of green space for each inhabitant.
sentences.cn: 开罗居民的人均绿地面积仅13平方厘米。

sentences.en: Firms need a breathing space if they are to recover.
sentences.cn: 这些公司需要短暂休整才能恢复元气。

sentences.en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentences.en: How much space is there on each disk?
I knew I'd never find a parking space in the Square.
sentences.cn: 我知道在广场上肯定找不到停车位。

sentences.en: In 1957, the Soviets launched Sputnik 1 into outer space.
sentences.cn: 1957年，苏联人将“斯普特尼克1号”人造卫星送入了外层空间。

sentences.en: Keep your office space looking good, particularly your desk.
sentences.cn: 保持办公环境的整洁，尤其是你的桌子。

sentences.en: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms.
sentences.cn: 大型油画可以增加小房间的宽敞感。

sentences.en: The Ariane space-rocket project has had a shining success.
sentences.cn: 阿里安航天火箭项目取得了辉煌的成功。

sentences.en: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.cn: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

sentences.en: The six astronauts on board will spend ten days in space.
sentences.cn: 飞船上的6名宇航员将在太空度过10天。

sentences.en: The space underneath could be used as a storage area.
sentences.cn: 底下的空间可用作储藏区。

sentences.en: The work space is a bare and cavernous warehouse.
sentences.cn: 工作场地是个空荡荡的大仓库。

sentences.en: These zip-top bags are great space-savers if storage is limited.
sentences.cn: 如果可储藏的地方有限，这些拉环式背包能节省很大空间。

sentences.en: They have been visited by creatures from outer space.
They'd pulled the registry office down which then left an open space.
sentences.cn: 他们拆掉户籍登记处后，那里留下了一片空地。

sentences.en: Watch this space for details of our next event.
sentences.cn: 请继续关注我们对下一事件的详细报道。

words.tran_cn: 隔开的；以规定距离排列的；间隔排列的
空间的；存在于空间的；占地位的

phrases.tran_cn: 空地；休憩用地；露天场所
空间环境；太空环境；宇宙环境
空间模型；立体模型；空间点阵
航天飞机（往返于地球和太空站之间运载人和物资的）
贮存面积，存储空间；贮藏室

trans.tran_en: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used
the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used
to arrange objects or events so that they have equal spaces or periods of time between them
